Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near Pulaski/Adams
ShortDescription: Southbound 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via: Pulaski, Mdison, Hamlin, Jackson, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Adams.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via: Pulaski, Mdison, Hamlin, Jackson, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Adams.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
